name: Winter without you
description:
A story about two people who cannot meet each other for the last two years because of strict border measures. The main character writes a letter to his girlfriend to revisit mutual memories together in these challenging times.

This is my first visual novel, and I am using assets that are available for free (links below). It's hard to say that this is a finished novel, so treat it as a work-in-progress project. Nevertheless, I will be happy to receive feedback in the comments below, or you can contact me directly in Discord to share your thoughts: sfilmak#6389. Thank you very much!

"Winter without you" is a submission to Winter VN Jam 2021. Thanks to organizers for an excellent opportunity to develop a visual novel.

List of free assets used:

  • Characters sprites: https://sutemo.itch.io/
  • Backgrounds: Pixabay
